resources.string: Day Streak: It uses a method in witch the user first indicates the quantity of how much is he willing to spend in one day and the days he will be saving using this method.

Example: Willing to spend 5$ in Days 7 Day 1 save 1$ total 1$ Day 2 save 2$ total 3$ Day 3 save 3$ total 6$ Day 4 save 4$ total 10$ Day 5 save 5$ total 15$ Day 6 save 1$ total 16$ Day 7 save 2$ total 18$
Tip to my self: Itâ€™s so simple, just tip your self and have the total. Example: 5$ tip + 10$ tip =15$ tipped in total.
Slice: Use a formula that the quantity you insert discount the percent you select. Example: Save 10% of 100$ = 10$
Created by: Angel Gabriel Luis Jonuel Reynaldo Ocasio Saulo Almeda
